name: RAC-MAN
description:
Hello, We are Leap Motion Developers Jp, our community has been active in Japan.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/leapmotionJp/

This is a Virtual Reality Chasing Game, made by Unreal Engine 4, using Leap Motion and Foot controller by Arduino to an experiment. This game operation is so fun!!

HOW TO PLAY
  • SetUp: Wearing HMD, and Put your hand on LeapMotion.
  • Forward: Push your hand from previous position.
  • Back: Pull your hand from previous position.
  • Right: Move your hand to right from previous position.
  • Left: Move your hand to left from previous position.
  • Jump: Push Foot controller or Space Button.
MANUAL
  • Fill and Enter your twitter account.
  • Push [Alt + Enter] to change to VR View.
  • Wearing your HMD.
  • Get all yellow ball in 120 sec!!

The game is free, please see details here:

https://www.hackster.io/leapmotiondevlopersjp/vruc-man-d52733

You could down load exe file (without foot controller) here.

Thanks
